body_html:
Great tip. Thanks!!!

@waoudi I got my

python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional

to work by modifying the line 37 of /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py to:

SOURCE_URL = 'https://github.com/HIPS/hypergrad/raw/master/data/mnist/'

Hopefully http://yann.lecun.com/ will come back online soon.

body:
Great tip.  Thanks!!!

@waoudi I got my

```
python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional
```

to work by modifying the line 37 of `/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py` to:

```
SOURCE_URL = 'https://github.com/HIPS/hypergrad/raw/master/data/mnist/'
```

Hopefully http://yann.lecun.com/ will come back online soon.
